name: Slime's Adventures The Hidden Gem
description:
Slime's Adventures The Hidden Gem is a 2D platformer all about collecting Gems and avoiding your demise.

Credits
  • Code written by Sleepy Wombat in the Godot Game Engine
  • Sprites made by Sleepy Wombat in Aseprite
  • A huge thank you to Game Endeavor for tutorials
Controls
  • Use "A" and "D" or arrow keys to move left and right
  • Use "Space" or "UP_ARROW" to jump
  • Use "E" to open doors in level select
